name: Military Sniper Shooter
description:
Military Sniper Shooter is trigger pulling action game. Mesmerized user with the action and thrill that is showed in this game. Military Sniper Shooter is addictive shooting game. Key features include the modern machine guns and combat rifles, best graphics, realistic animations of bombings and shillings by enemy, destruction and killing all around the city, devastation and redemption of city and much more.

FEATURES:
• Multiple challenging sniper 3D missions
• Thrilling epic battles against the fierce enemy
• Stunning 3D graphics for a realistic war experience
• Panoramic view of the battlefield
• Breathtaking sound effects
